metadata.title: Drake Waterfowl Kids' Little Merino Wool Heavyweight Outdoor Crew Boot Socks 2 Pair Pack
features: Heavyweight crew boot socks for both boys and girls provide ultimate support, durability, and insulation
Full cushion leg and foot provide optimal padding and impact protection
Soft merino wool acrylic blend and superior moisture control keeps feet cool and dry for all day wear
Arch support and reinforced heel and toe provide better fit for kids growing feet
Stay up rib leg and top Keep socks in place and reduces slipping and bunching
description: Drake kids boys girls merino wool acrylic blend full cushion wicking heavyweight outdoor crew boot socks 2 pair pack are perfect for active boys and girls! These unisex socks feature full cushion leg and foot, heavyweight insulation and comfort, moisture wicking, soft merino wool acrylic blend, arch support, Reinforced heel and toe, and a stay up rib top. These socks provide optimal support, comfort, and durability for outdoors, play, boots, school, sports, hunting, hiking, fishing, waterfowl, camping, trekking, mountaineering, trail walking, rucking, and more.

title: Wool Socks & Toe Warmers for My 9 Year Old - Hunt Warmly
